formattedAddress: 160 Bennett Ave, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 160 Bennett Ave, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text:
Taking a gander at reviews while I wait for the office to open and I find myself needing to chime in after seeing the negative reviews. My son, almost 14, has been seeing Dr. Eng. since he was only days old. We now cross state borders to continue to see her or Dr. Supansic who joined the office some years ago (who is just as excellent).

There has been only a couple of times the office has not been able to fit in my boy the day of for an appointment in the almost 14 years we've been going. The receptionists are kind and thorough. The assistants who prep patients.. same.

If you're looking for lifelong pediatricians, I can attest to it that they have always exceeded my expectations. Wait times are minimal, one on one with the drs extensive, detailed and NOT rushed and their diagnosis accurate. They return messages by end of day. They have gone above and beyond in too many ways to itemize here. As well, I have not been asked to leave this review or benefit from it in any way.

My son, almost 14, has been seeing Dr. Eng. since he was only days old. We now cross state borders to continue to see her or Dr. Supansic who joined the office some years ago (who is just as excellent).

There has been only a couple of times the office has not been able to fit in my boy the day of for an appointment in the almost 14 years we've been going. The receptionists are kind and thorough. The assistants who prep patients.. same.

If you're looking for lifelong pediatricians, I can attest to it that they have always exceeded my expectations. They have gone above and beyond in too many ways to itemize here. As well, I have not been asked to leave this review or benefit from it in any way.

originalText.text: I am very satisfied with the care my son receives at Dr Eng's office. Both Dr. Eng and Dr. Supansic are super thorough and caring, I have never felt rushed when I take my son for his visits. I did have to change my son to another doctor a few years ago due to an issue I had with one of their administrative policies; but I ended up coming right back. Dr. Eng was my pediatrician and I am 35 years old!! so that goes to show the years of expertise she has under her belt. Definitely recommend her office for great primary care!

text.text: I am very satisfied with the care my son receives at Dr Eng's office. Both Dr. Eng and Dr. Supansic are super thorough and caring, I have never felt rushed when I take my son for his visits. I did have to change my son to another doctor a few years ago due to an issue I had with one of their administrative policies; but I ended up coming right back. Dr. Eng was my pediatrician and I am 35 years old!! so that goes to show the years of expertise she has under her belt. Definitely recommend her office for great primary care!

originalText.text: It feels like family whenever we go take our 18 month old for his checkups. Both Dr. Eng and Dr. Supansic are incredibly knowledgeable and ease any worries we have regarding our sons development. We will always have a slew of questions and they never rush us to speak to the next client.The offices are always clean and well kept. Checking in and setting up appointments are a breeze. We travel pretty far to come here and it is well worth it.

originalText.text: Great pediatrician office. Runs on time, easy to register and schedule with for a newborn, and providers have been awesome. Highly recommend!

text.text: Great pediatrician office. Runs on time, easy to register and schedule with for a newborn, and providers have been awesome. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Friendly staff. outstanding service all around from the doctors and nurses. They take their time with my child and explain everything to me. They also squeezed us in for an emergency visit. I’m so grateful we found them!
